text: Double Negative (also known as Deadly Companion) is a 1980 Canadian thriller movie directed by George Bloomfield and based on the novel by Ross Macdonald. It stars John Candy, Susan Clark, Anthony Perkins, Howard Duff, Al Waxman, Kenneth Welsh, Kate Reid. ==Other websites== * * * Deadly Companion/Double Negative on Allmovie Category:1980 thriller movies Category:Canadian thriller movies
title: Double Negative
